Should a keepalive response not be received within TcpKeepAliveInterval (seconds), a subsequent keepalive probe will be sent. For .NET Framework, should 10 keepalive probes fail, the connection will terminate. For .NET Core, should a number of probes fail as specified in TcpKeepAliveRetryCount, the connection will terminate. TCP keepalives are not supported in .NET Standard.
